Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Boards

Class StrongBox

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Boards.StrongBox
public class StrongBox
extends java.lang.Object
public class representing the strongbox associated to a player

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    StrongBox()
    creates a new empty StrongBox

  • Constructor Details

    • StrongBox

      public StrongBox()
      creates a new empty StrongBox

  • Method Details

    • getResources

      public java.util.HashMap<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> getResources()
      Returns:
      returns a map containing the resources currently in the strongbox with their quantity

    • addResource

      public void addResource​(Resource resource, int quantity)
      adds a specific (POSITIVE) quantity of a resource to the strongbox
      Parameters:
      resource - represents the resource we want to add to the strongbox
      quantity - represents how much of that resource we want to add

    • takeResource

      public void takeResource​(Resource resource, int quantity)
      removes a specific (POSITIVE) quantity of a resource from the strongbox. The caller has to check if there are enough resources
      Parameters:
      resource - represents the resource we want to remove from the strongbox
      quantity - represents how much of that resource we want to remove

    • getQuantity

      public int getQuantity​(Resource resource)
      gets the quantity of a certain resource
      Parameters:
      resource - represents the resource we want to know the quantity of
      Returns:
      returns the quantity of the specified resource

    • calculateTotalResources

      public int calculateTotalResources()
      Returns:
      returns the total resources left in the strongbox

    • showStrongBox

      public java.util.List<ResQuantity> showStrongBox()
